downloadTitle: Microsoft Dynamics 365 Customer Engagement Portals Source Code
downloadDescription: Self-hosted Portals Source code for Dynamics 365 Customer Engagement
detailsSection:
This download contains the Dynamics 365 Customer Engagement Portals Source Code which will allow you to customize portal as per your requirements and to deploy it to Dynamics 365 (on-premises) as well as Dynamics 365 (online). It is compatible with Dynamics 365 (online and on-premises) versions 8.1 and later. The download consists of the following files:
  • MicrosoftDynamics365PortalsSolutions.exe: The solution files.
  • MicrosoftDynamics365PortalsSource.exe: The source code.
  • Self-hosted_Installation_Guide_for_Portals: The deployment instructions for the source code.
systemRequirementsSection: For a complete listing of the requirements for this software, please view the Self-hosted Installation Guide included.
installInstructionSection:
To start the download, click Download. If the File Download dialog box appears, do one of the following:
  • To start the download immediately, click Open.
  • To copy the download to your computer to view later, click Save.
